item.title: Pushing (from GoGS) with `post-receive` (to a mirror)
item.description: I have a GoGS server for my work. I want to back it up off-site to our GitLab instance. According to a document I read this should be possible using post-receive hooks.

item.title: GitHub Pages Publish
